title: Cancel Subscription
description: A customer wants to cancel their monthly subscription at the end of the current billing period.

tasks.description: Verify the user's identity and authority to cancel the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms they are speaking to the account owner.

tasks.description: Ask for the reason for cancellation and attempt a retention offer if applicable (e.g., a discount).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the cancellation reason and makes a retention offer, which the customer declines.

tasks.description: Process the subscription cancellation to be effective at the end of the billing cycle.
